creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: 9 white deconstructed bowls to be installed in a grid of three rows/three columns on wall; each piece is a small bowl that has been sliced into three or four sections that have been reattached at odd angles; each part has a wire hanger at top
dimension:
5 × 5 × 5 in. (12.7 × 12.7 × 12.7 cm) (object part, each piece, approximate)
20 × 20 × 5 in. (50.8 × 50.8 × 12.7 cm) (installed)
markings: each piece is numbered 1-9 in black ink near wire hanger
signed: handwriten on top of #i, black ink: A.E.Hirondelle
title: Remember Grid
